title: Swain Rework ETA?
body: It's been a hot minute since Riot announced the Swain rework, but unlike the Eve rework we haven't heard anything since then. Is there a reason?

replies.body: A lot of folks have been on holiday break, so activity was slow for a bit.  I don't have any info on reworks, but you'll want to bookmark the[ champion update guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule) for updates on that.
